text: Robert "Bobby" Banas (born September 22, 1933 died July 29, 2024) is an American dancer and actor. He is known for his work on movies such as West Side Story (1961), Always (1989) and Down and Out in Beverly Hills (1986). He also did a televised performance of the dance (which he also choreographed) for the 1963 Shirley Ellis song, "Nitty Gritty". ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American dancers Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Robert Banas
